verbs.description: meeten (third-person singular simple present meetens, present participle meetening, simple past and past participle meetened)

entries.meaning: (transitive, intransitive) To make or become meet or fit; make suitable; adapt; prepare.
examples: Let us accustom ourselves to contemplate the most eminent examples of this spirit, that, by daily imitating them, we may, through grace, be progressively "meetening" for the participation of their inheritance.
